languages.text: "Знаешь ли ты, сколь разнообразны эссенции, которые можно извлечь из психической энергии умирающего разумного существа? Как оттенки страдания и способы принятия смерти изменяют их свойства? Это великая алхимия смерти и преображения!"

traits.locale_text: "Мы живем много дольше наших сородичей, наши умы хранят знания сотен поколений и память о временах, которые сохранились лишь в легендах. Гемункул – уникальная судьба для друкари и только самые выдающиеся из исследователей неизведанных истоков боли способны удостоиться ее".
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: "Are you aware of the beautiful variety of essences that can be extracted from the psychic energy of a dying sentient creature? Of the ways shades of torment and methods of termination alter an essence's properties? This is the great alchemy of death and transformation!"
languages.original_text: "Знаешь ли ты, сколь разнообразны эссенции, которые можно извлечь из психической энергии умирающего разумного существа? Как оттенки страдания и способы принятия смерти изменяют их свойства? Это великая алхимия смерти и преображения!"

traits.locale_text: "Are you aware of the beautiful variety of essences one can extract from the psychic energy of a dying sentient creature? Of the ways in which shades of torment and methods of termination can alter their properties? That is the great alchemy of death and transformation!"
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.locale_text: "Are you aware of the beautiful variety of essences one can extract from the psychic energy of a dying sentient creature? Of the ways in which shades of torment and methods of termination can alter their properties? That is the great alchemy of death and transformation!"
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.locale_text: "Are you aware of the beautiful variety of essences that can be extracted from the psychic energy of a dying sentient creature? Of the ways shades of torment and methods of termination alter an essence's properties? This is the great alchemy of death and transformation!"
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.locale_text: "Are you aware of the beautiful variety of essences that can be extracted from the psychic energy of a dying sentient creature? Of the ways shades of torment and methods of termination alter an essence's properties? This is the great alchemy of death and transformation!"
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.locale_text: "Are you aware of the beautiful variety of essences that can be extracted from the psychic energy of a dying sentient creature? Of the ways shades of torment and methods of termination alter an essence's properties? This is the great alchemy of death and transformation!"
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: « Avez-vous seulement conscience de l'immense variété d'essences qui peuvent être extraites de l'énergie psychique d'une créature sensible à l'agonie ? De la manière dont les différentes nuances de tourment et les méthodes d'extinction modifient les propriétés d'une essence ? C'est là la noble alchimie de la mort et de la transformation ! »
languages.original_text: "Are you aware of the beautiful variety of essences that can be extracted from the psychic energy of a dying sentient creature? Of the ways shades of torment and methods of termination alter an essence's properties? This is the great alchemy of death and transformation!"

traits.locale_text: « Avez-vous seulement conscience de l'immense variété d'essences qui peuvent être extraites de l'énergie psychique d'une créature sensible à l'agonie ? De la manière dont les différentes nuances de tourment et les méthodes d'extinction modifient les propriétés d'une essence ? C'est là la noble alchimie de la mort et de la transformation ! »
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: “你知道，从垂死生物的灵能能量中，可以提炼出多么美妙的精华吗？你知道，折磨的阴影与杀死实验对象的手段，会如何改变这些精华的特质吗？这就是死亡与转化的伟大炼金术！”
languages.original_text: "Are you aware of the beautiful variety of essences that can be extracted from the psychic energy of a dying sentient creature? Of the ways shades of torment and methods of termination alter an essence's properties? This is the great alchemy of death and transformation!"

traits.locale_text: “你知道，从垂死生物的灵能能量中，可以提炼出多么美妙的精华吗？你知道，折磨的阴影与杀死实验样本的手段，会如何改变这些精华的特质吗？这就是死亡与转化的伟大炼金术！”
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: "Wisst Ihr um die wunderschöne Vielfalt von Essenzen, die sich aus der psychischen Energie eines sterbenden intelligenten Wesens extrahieren lassen? Wisst Ihr, wie Schattierungen der Pein und Methoden der Terminierung die Eigenschaften einer Essenz verändern? Das ist die große Alchemie von Tod und Transformation!"
languages.original_text: "Are you aware of the beautiful variety of essences that can be extracted from the psychic energy of a dying sentient creature? Of the ways shades of torment and methods of termination alter an essence's properties? This is the great alchemy of death and transformation!"

traits.locale_text: "Wisst Ihr um die wunderschöne Vielfalt von Essenzen, die sich aus der psychischen Energie eines sterbenden intelligenten Wesens extrahieren lassen? Wisst Ihr, wie Schattierungen der Pein und Methoden der Terminierung die Eigenschaften einer Essenz verändern? Das ist die große Alchemie von Tod und Transformation!"
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: «¿Sabes la maravillosa variedad de esencias que se pueden extraer de la energía psíquica de una criatura moribunda y consciente? ¿Has visto alguna vez cómo se alteran las propiedades de una esencia al aplicar diferentes formas de tormento y métodos de asesinato? ¡Así es la excepcional alquimia de la muerte y la transformación!».
languages.original_text: "Are you aware of the beautiful variety of essences that can be extracted from the psychic energy of a dying sentient creature? Of the ways shades of torment and methods of termination alter an essence's properties? This is the great alchemy of death and transformation!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Sabes la maravillosa variedad de esencias que se pueden extraer de la energía psíquica de una criatura moribunda y consciente? ¿Has visto alguna vez cómo se alteran las propiedades de una esencia al aplicar diferentes formas de tormento y métodos de asesinato? ¡Así es la excepcional alquimia de la muerte y la transformación!».
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: 「瀕死の知覚を持つクリーチャーの精神エネルギーから抽出できる、美しく多様なエッセンスを知っているか？苦痛の陰影と終結の方法がエッセンスの特性を変える方法については？死と変容の偉大な錬金術だぞ！」
languages.original_text: "Are you aware of the beautiful variety of essences that can be extracted from the psychic energy of a dying sentient creature? Of the ways shades of torment and methods of termination alter an essence's properties? This is the great alchemy of death and transformation!"

traits.locale_text: 「瀕死の知覚を持つクリーチャーの精神エネルギーから抽出できる、美しく多様なエッセンスを知っているか？苦痛の陰影と終結の方法がエッセンスの特性を変える方法については？死と変容の偉大な錬金術だぞ！」
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: "İrade sahibi bir yaratığın ölürken ortaya çıkardığı ruhsezi enerjisinden elde edilebilen özlerin çeşitliliğinin güzelliğinin farkında mısın? Izdırabın tonlarının ve sonlandırma metotlarının, bir özün niteliklerini nasıl değiştirdiğinin? Yüce ölüm ve dönüşüm simyası böyle bir şeydir!"
languages.original_text: "Are you aware of the beautiful variety of essences that can be extracted from the psychic energy of a dying sentient creature? Of the ways shades of torment and methods of termination alter an essence's properties? This is the great alchemy of death and transformation!"

traits.locale_text: "İrade sahibi bir yaratığın ölürken ortaya çıkardığı ruhsezi enerjisinden elde edilebilen özlerin çeşitliliğinin güzelliğinin farkında mısın? Izdırabın tonlarının ve sonlandırma metotlarının, bir özün niteliklerini nasıl değiştirdiğinin? Yüce ölüm ve dönüşüm simyası böyle bir şeydir!"
traits.speaker: Haemonculae
